channel.title: did noone recognize it...?
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "did noone recognize it...?"

item.title: Re: did noone recognize it...?
item.content:encoded: Yes most/all of the r00t stuff is based on .hack because that is what McMasters based the content off of so not everything will be noted.

item.title: Re: did noone recognize it...?
item.content:encoded: ok some character references are noted such as trapchan lvl 2 being sora and smokey the bear 2 being bear etc.

item.title: Re: did noone recognize it...?
item.content:encoded: on another check most of the r00t stuff is a reference to the .hack series and none of it is noted

item.title: did noone recognize it...?
item.content:encoded:
Usually the anime references are pointed out on the relevant wiki page but noone noticed the phase reference?

On the wiki page for the cursed wave (phases). It does not point out the obvious if unexpected reference to the .hack series and the 8 phases of the cursed wave (morganna).

Did the reference slip through or was it just not considered important?
